sentences.sContent: I would rather hoe in the garden than run on the playground.
sentences.sContent_eng: I would rather hoe in the garden than run on the playground.
sentences.sCn: 我宁愿在花园里锄草，不愿在运动场上跑来跑去。

sentences.sContent: I would rather hoe in the garden than run about on the playground.
sentences.sContent_eng: I would rather hoe in the garden than run about on the playground.
sentences.sCn: 我宁愿在花园里锄草，不愿在运动场上跑来跑去。

sentences.sContent: I would rather hoe in the garden than run about on the playground .
sentences.sContent_eng: I would rather hoe in the garden than run about on the playground .
sentences.sCn: 我宁愿在花园锄草，也不愿在运动场上跑来跑去。

words.tran: [农学] 锄地；挖掘；锄草（hoe的现在分词）

trans.tranOther: a garden tool with a long handle, used for removing  weeds (= unwanted plants )  from the surface of the soil
